titlealts.searchtitle: Class: META CARE ACTIVITY IN CONTEXT - Description

div.p: This is a meta model class.

A relationship between a META CARE ACTIVITY DIRECT and the META CARE ACTIVITY CONTEXT in which it occurs. For example Alice Spring's wart was removed (META CARE ACTIVITY DIRECT) during her 'GP consultation on 10:50 - 11:10 7/2/2002' (META CARE ACTIVITY CONTEXT).
A META CARE ACTIVITY DIRECT can span more than one META CARE ACTIVITY CONTEXT, e.g. providing chemotherapy for lymphoma would usually involve consultations to administer the repeated doses required.
